greater bandwidth which is more easily accessible with the fa there's the lower latency but there's also the SRD
protocol this is scalable reliable data gram and this is a proprietary AWS
network protocol which is working really good really well to limit jitter and
what is remarkable about it is your calculation your tightly coupled calculations are not going to march at
the speed of the fastest network connection they're going to march at the speed of the slowest network connection
